name: cryptpad
description: CryptPad is a privacy-first collaborative suite offering real-time editing for documents, spreadsheets, Kanban, forms, and more. It uses end-to-end encryption, a zero-knowledge model, and can be emulated as an alternative to Google Workspace.
features: Real-Time Collaboration: Edit documents simultaneously with team members. Google Docs alternative.
End-to-End Encryption: All content encrypted in your browser. Zero-knowledge privacy.
Complete Suite: Documents, spreadsheets, Kanban, forms, and more. Everything you need.
Zero-Knowledge: Server never sees your unencrypted data. True privacy guaranteed.
Rich Editing: Full-featured editors for professional work. No compromises on functionality.
Self-Hosted: Own your collaborative workspace completely. No third-party access ever.
